attributes.action: To provide all students with EMA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like for The Prime Minister to make EMA available to all students in the UK. We would like this because not all students get EMA, and suffer because of this as they have to pay out of their own pockets; Which can be tough in a recession as not everybody can get a job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
